dcterms:creator: A. Rahman
E. Fosong
I. Carlucho
S. V. Albrecht
dcterms:description: A cooperative environment where two agents can move across a two-dimensional grid world, receiving rewards when they simultaneously arrive at the same corner grid.
dcterms:title: Cooperative Reaching

dcterms:creator: A. Rahman
E. Fosong
I. Carlucho
S. V. Albrecht
dcterms:description: Similar to Cooperative Reaching, but with a modified reward function that provides lower rewards if both agents arrive at different corner cells.
dcterms:title: Weighted Cooperative Reaching

dcterms:creator: A. Rahman
E. Fosong
I. Carlucho
S. V. Albrecht
dcterms:description: An environment where agents must move to a cell next to the same object and retrieve it by simultaneously selecting actions for collecting objects.
dcterms:title: Level-based Foraging

dcterms:creator: A. Rahman
E. Fosong
I. Carlucho
S. V. Albrecht
dcterms:description: A game where agents have three actions, and the reward function is based on the actions taken by the agents.
dcterms:title: Repeated Matrix Game
